description: ResourceRef names a single resource. Only one of the fields should be set.

address.description: \[d\] Account whose balance record is accessible by the executing ApprovalProgram or ClearStateProgram.

application-id.description:
\[p\] Application id whose GlobalState may be read by the executing
 ApprovalProgram or ClearStateProgram.

asset-id.description:
\[s\] Asset whose AssetParams may be read by the executing
 ApprovalProgram or ClearStateProgram.

box.description: BoxReference names a box by its name and the application ID it belongs to.

app.description: Application ID to which the box belongs, or zero if referring to the called application.

holding.description: HoldingRef names a holding by referring to an Address and Asset it belongs to.

address.description: \[d\] Address in access list, or the sender of the transaction.

asset.description: \[s\] Asset ID for asset in access list.

local.description: LocalsRef names a local state by referring to an Address and App it belongs to.

address.description: \[d\] Address in access list, or the sender of the transaction.

app.description: \[p\] Application ID for app in access list, or zero if referring to the called application.
